full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 204 of 236 1108 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 A. No, sir, that was in the lake room. 2 Q. Yes. I'm sorry. I'm looking at the lake room on the far right. 3 A. All right. 4 Q. You see the lake room is on the far right? 5 A. Yes, it is. 6 Q. And that's the room that had the desk where the money was taken; is that right? 7 A. True. 8 Q. What I just want to point out is that the lake room is on the opposite end of the house on the first floor from the staff room; is that right? 9 A. That is true. 10 MR. VERDELL: If we could pull in what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 297, which is the second floor of the house. 11 Q. Do you see that, Mr. Parkinson? 12 A. I do, sir. 13 Q. We're looking there at the diagram of the second floor of the house; yes? 14 A. That is correct, sir. 15 Q. Now, you see in sort of the middle of the diagram, there is a semicircular -- it looks like a semicircular staircase; is that right? 16 A. True. 17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018305
